messages.content:
text fragment:
===
French
===
Identify the 'text fragment' language and generate a relevant paragraph in the identified language.

C'est la vie - French for "That's life". This phrase is often used when something unfortunate happens or when something doesn't go as planned. It can also be used to express a resigned acceptance of a situation.
I provided you with the word 'French'. Can't you identify what is the language of this word?
Yes, French is the language of this word. The word itself means "That's life" in French.
